description: Runtime server features for ASP.NET Core hosted Uno Platform applications.
releaseNotes:
#  (2023-09-12)


### Bug Fixes

* Add additional compressed extensions (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/1682ffb112ec28d4643ed5e14a82327cf8bb1392)
* Add workaround for dotnet/runtime 90745 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/9d4f7d912ac46990b15d6957b4522c050a2e79e0)
* Adjust aot profile generation (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/c48cd45a984fed530e8bbe1a7654430ce55475c2)
* Adjust authors nuget property (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/e044fcff2e5cda31c30b8ba30d173e8ebbed0b01)
* Adjust devserver for absolute OutputPath override (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/9ca536073041137fe65b4ceec7edc6e27cd618f7)
* Adjust for IntermediateOutputPath requiring a sub-path of the current project (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/43f7d6b335ac7ed97e4e4425c2d544d1f925850c)
* Adjust for mono-config format (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b5bd1ed207172274efade5ab10afea6b25174d15)
* adjust log profile generation (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/ee18f511f1f173adfd82289908aafbd954192dee)
* Adjust path conversion for WSL (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/15e5f3b7fb173b93446dce9416f07f4647a24127)
* Adjust response file for aot-instances (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/6130aeebaf6e09cecd7d3d89ec9a072f1c5bde06)
* Adjust splash screen image sizing (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/49e229f16d7e1117b2d4b66c79116bccc3a59163)
* Always use response compression (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/68bec58269742beb8795b7e38aaf956134889412)
* **aot:** Adjust AOT profile generation after runtime update (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/8edbb255c66655178b19ee3820f0224ef5d4bd25)
* **aot:** Generate logging on empty assembly generation (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/251760e1db42156ddf6a4e6719b769af2c37fb64)
* Apply fix from mono/mono@a44926a5be1c648deec836e9cdda3c93e25f9a51 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/fb7fc423a9771d9ae6dea419f830c7be017744fa)
* Avoid Microsoft Edge visual search popup (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/0489ffae88fe01410d01ea014b96667dee810036)
* Avoid re-removing loader (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/90b67e2e55dcb29d3c1300655b6081d0cf66021c)
* Build aot-intances with the head's target framework (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/7aad0fa3dd732ccc08fc5eb3e1686d07e65f6dd5)
* Cleanup more dist files (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/06e60bae308bd563cdeac889b3a1fcafb1d1ecdb)
* **debugger:** Adjust pdb loading entry point and location (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/6b4cf6947fa0bae7a87e5350d3ade7d9d097fde5)
* Default image should be relative to Uno Platform domain (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b3d3f170c15b3f08cd0d3ed2436433f3e6ccd781)
* Disable local server compression to enable BrowserLink (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/653b26c8b59c57834b41173804ea20ca474ed0b7)
* Disable unused attributes trimming (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/adaf7514be16db0b623a2b753c6f175927c238fd)
* Don't depend on Microsoft.AspNetCore.App (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/19fd3409551f585886bc85abe97dc3ea4032f63e)
* **embedded:** Fixed broken embedded mode (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/14d0b265cd82af44fa0554452e688a39593a0b1f)
* **emsdk:** Adjust emsdk setup for windows root with spaces (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/395ac5caf4bce459548e79ffa81704ba7c670cbc)
* Ensure build failure on emscripten install failure on Windows (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/bfeba140072443dfff8ecfc2b30d6e1141dcd21e)
* Ensure filename obfuscation works with obfuscation (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/4aaf7ebfed1d0b2c4b249567ae41cec7b3d71503)
* Ensure INITIAL_MEMORY is configurable (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/e612bc061cacbf0e3fd31e12c0b347a76af7afa6)
* **exception:** Fixed support when other files are published (.config, .pdb, etc...) on the server. (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/d1bacee906d01aadb270f98c77142fb3c159086c)
* **extensionless:** Adjust for filename-only renaming (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/cae9c86778f382ea03fad0a248530270b7f184aa)
* Fixed service worker install error (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/8a7447b17e07664b4837fd9ff96d08cb96cce695)
* Initialize threaded runtime properly in AotInterp mode (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/9bb4ce0b3e8e2304bd8ea22d92767f621756ab61)
* **obj:** Remove invalid obj files in nuspec (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/15df36edd0a4b4ad3b563ed197e90564f0ecee09)
* **outputpath:** Adjust for output path customization (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/8624cf123fc0d9bdf51b3eaecd2f6f5e478073a4)
* Propagate Environment variables properly for AOT profiling (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/899210e26911edf99116aa65690a4e41094a5298)
* Publish dist folder in wwwroot to align with default UseStaticFiles behavior (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/872287f0d10962720c70764e507df4d8694a6e55)
* **reg:** escaping for intermediate output path (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/7c36a964dcae0985224685006dd964bf3b6163ef)
* **reg:** Remove invalid offline file inclusion (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/7d3257bb50e6b424d54792eedfd7e0e59b143212)
* Remove dependency on csc (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/04a0c569af28b8d83e333268c758bc843d14c2ba)
* Remove linked satellite assemblies refs in interp mode (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/781b152318a229f2b3fb8bc5c9c863a62585d695)
* Report failure properly on linker errors (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/9f8cc143ede7792ec2575d3a351eed24635ef31c)
* restore metadata updater, include new pdb delta (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a1ead0bfce27d28f4f79d1a5cb55de7c6a67dc2b)
* Restore original defaults for Powershell environment (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/38931d2933c22f5badd2be464568a03d1682d916)
* **staticassets:** Don't include static assets `StaticWebAsset` in the ShellTask assets property (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/f31dcabbf2483daf474342c8a97741d49038c27f)
* **threads:** Don't enable secure mode unless threading is enabled for local server (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/74311cda9f8d06a2c27cd080129c20e4aef15178)
* **threads:** missing max threads parameter (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/ee4fbecac948ecbd131233718c466444cd33f925)
* **tuner:** Don't copy the tuner binaries in the runtime tools folder (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/c51731fcf18132348f337df6fbf27403161329dc)
* Url relative to uno platform domain (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/58c862c3236e5a9feabe2f867b0d23ee0637d539)
* **windows:** Adjust tuner invocations to use a response file (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/5836c979adeebb1ea9496f3bd22d833d4faf039a)
* **worker:** Adjust service worker file location before generating the config file (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b59dd9f005c5132e964d1fc64de87706135d843e)
* **worker:** Don't fail worker installation on failed downloads (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/29467759199f9d4e8cbd92042a80929115533cd0)
* **wsl:** Adjust support for missing net7 linker binaries (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/d64bd31686c1b6d21bee5bb830a44791c80929b0)


### Features

* Add support for WebAssemblyHttpRequestMessageExtensions (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/ca6922bc692fd268c81b8ecb0336517c4f92f3e7)
* Adjust support for CSP (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/b791338c74a957631ddc2cec5113a46ae52f55b4)
* Allow Uno app to persist the loader (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/a04a380878d4ed3970b386d8aaf360c01f3f1d02)
* Do not remove loader until uno-body changes (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/4ffe146ad3f3a7b0b6a35867b9ee98fa74032318)
* Keep the splash screen background on uno-body (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/73ac31325d0492f2ae4b864de2834848444dd196)
* **localization:** Add support satellite resource assemblies publishing (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/bd0e1fdbfe54ddc91fc7457ce8159aced3e3775a)
* **obfuscation:** Adds support for extension-less assembly URIs (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/65f4d79ef04b1bb4568a6386d2e959400f392d52)
* Themeable accent color (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/1104c9c33224cef8a56bbb03bdc16ed750ea5dc9)
* **unover:** Added `uno-ver` tool (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/0cc17ac9355d53ef6163944b3d1fc536cf8ccd3b)
* Update to .NET 8 Preview 7 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/fbb052421ab265226625a291c5dbc9d7b26c2cf9)
* Upgrade to .NET 8 Preview 7 (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/0cdddceef9f0c271efbe35f5a05a2197c400a108)
* Use SDK provided linker for performance (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/bd4318b11945d680112efb7b9d1b3ee19084d569)


### Performance Improvements

* Avoid using PowerShell for some copies (https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/commit/1479719b3a46171dad003612670900e1bdf08d2e)
